[https://middle-earth.xenite.org/ Middle-earth Blog] }} '''Michael Martinez''' (born [[1959]]) is one of the most well-known [[Tolkienist|scholars]] in regards to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s literary works. He first published ''[[Parma Endorion]]'' in [[1996]] and has published a vast array of essays over the years. Most of these can be read online via his [http://www.merp.com/essays/michael-martinez-1 section on MERP.com]. ==Bilbiography== ===Books=== *[[1996]]: ''[[Parma Endorion]]'' *[[2000]]: ''Visualizing Middle-earth'' *[[2003]]: ''Understanding Middle-earth''. *[[2014]]: ''Mindfaring through Middle-earth'' ==External links== * [http://middle-earth.xenite.org/ Middle-earth & J.R.R. Tolkien Blog] by Michael Martinez {{DEFAULTSORT:Martinez, Michael}} [[Category:American people]] [[Category:Authors]] [[Category:People by name]]
